messages.message: Have there been any changes that would cause sandboxes to be automatically deleted? I'm seeing errors on many Cypress test runs due to sandboxes no longer existing and every test getting a 404 - for exmaple https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67208. Here's an example where a lot of the tests passed, then some started giving 404s: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67207
I am not aware of anything that may have changed :thinking_face: let me poke around some things first, but we may need to rope in the crafting devs

Ah, I think there's a bug in the sandbox cleanup job (ref (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/tools/releasetools/jenkins/pipelines/crafting/cypress-sandbox-reaper.groovy#L58)), I'll pause the job and work on a fix for this
